name: PRECURSOR
description: PRECURSOR is a unique mouse oriented puzzle game in which you must keep your mouse alive while enduring obstacles, mazes and other problems thrown your way. Its levels are designed to be difficult although the game is rather short and it should only take around 10 minutes for you to complete. This game was originally a submission to the 46th Ludum Dare and was made over a weekend  from April 17th-19th 2020.
